languages.text: A mechanic that allows a character to act more than once during a single {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Usually extra turns are granted by the special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} of certain archetypes, such as the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}. Abilities that grant extra turns cannot be used during an extra turn.
languages.original_text: Позволяет персонажу сделать ход больше одного раза за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. Дополнительные ходы, как правило, дают специальные {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} определенных архетипов, например, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}офицера{/g}. Во время дополнительного хода нельзя применять способности дающие дополнительные ходы.

traits.locale_text: A mechanic that allows a character act more than once during a single {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Usually extra turns are granted by special abilities of certain {g|Encyclopedia:Career}doctrine{/g}, such as the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Leader{/g}. Abilities that grant extra turns cannot be used during an extra turn.

A mechanic that allows a character act more than once during a single {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Usually extra turns are granted by special abilities of certain {g|Encyclopedia:Career}doctrine{/g}, such as the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Leader{/g}. Abilities that grant extra turns cannot be used during an extra turn.

A mechanic that allows a character to act more than once during a single {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Usually extra turns are granted by the special abilities of certain {g|Encyclopedia:Career}doctrines{/g}, such as the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Leader{/g}. Abilities that grant extra turns cannot be used during an extra turn.

A mechanic that allows a character to act more than once during a single {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Usually extra turns are granted by the special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} of certain archetypes, such as the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}. Abilities that grant extra turns cannot be used during an extra turn.

A mechanic that allows a character to act more than once during a single {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Usually extra turns are granted by the special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} of certain archetypes, such as the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}. Abilities that grant extra turns cannot be used during an extra turn.

languages.text: Позволяет персонажу сделать ход больше одного раза за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. Дополнительные ходы, как правило, дают специальные {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} определенных архетипов, например, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}офицера{/g}. Во время дополнительного хода нельзя применять способности дающие дополнительные ходы.

Eine Mechanik, die einem Charakter erlaubt, mehr als einmal in einer {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} zu agieren. Normalerweise werden Zusatzzüge durch die besonderen {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} bestimmter Archetypen {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Offizier{/g} gewährt. Fähigkeiten, die Zusatzzüge gewähren, können während eines Zusatzzugs nicht genutzt werden.
languages.original_text: A mechanic that allows a character to act more than once during a single {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Usually extra turns are granted by the special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} of certain archetypes, such as the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}. Abilities that grant extra turns cannot be used during an extra turn.

traits.locale_text: Eine Mechanik, die es einem Charakter erlaubt, mehr als einmal in einer {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} zu handeln. Normalerweise werden Zusatzzüge durch die besonderen Fähigkeiten bestimmter {g|Encyclopedia:Career}Doktrinen{/g}, wie z.B. {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Anführer{/g}, gewährt. Fähigkeiten, die Zusatzzüge gewähren, können während eines Zusatzzugs nicht genutzt werden.

languages.text: Mécanisme qui permet à un personnage d'agir plusieurs fois au cours d'un même {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. En général, les tours supplémentaires sont conférés par les {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} spéciales de certains archétypes (par exemple, l'archétype d'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}officier{/g}). Les capacités conférant des tours supplémentaires ne peuvent pas être utilisées pendant ce type de tour.
languages.original_text: A mechanic that allows a character to act more than once during a single {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Usually extra turns are granted by the special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} of certain archetypes, such as the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}. Abilities that grant extra turns cannot be used during an extra turn.

traits.locale_text: Mécanisme qui permet à un personnage d'agir plusieurs fois au cours d'un même {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. En général, les tours supplémentaires sont conférés par les capacités spéciales de certaines {g|Encyclopedia:Career}doctrines{/g}, comme la doctrine de {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Leader{/g}. Les capacités qui confèrent des tours supplémentaires ne peuvent pas être utilisées pendant ce type de tours.

languages.text: 这种机制可以让某个角色在一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中多次行动。通常来说，额外回合是由某些特定职业的特殊{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}授予的，例如{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}军官{/g}职业的相关能力。在额外回合中，无法再次使用给予额外回合的能力。
languages.original_text: A mechanic that allows a character to act more than once during a single {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Usually extra turns are granted by the special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} of certain archetypes, such as the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}. Abilities that grant extra turns cannot be used during an extra turn.

traits.locale_text: 这种机制可以让某个角色在一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中多次行动。通常来说，额外回合是由某些特定{g|Encyclopedia:Career}信条{/g}的特殊能力授予的，例如{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}领袖{/g}信条的相关能力。在额外回合中，无法再次使用给予额外回合的能力。

languages.text: Una mecánica que permite que un personaje actúe más de una vez en un mismo {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. Por lo general los turnos extra son concedidos por capacidades especiales de algunos {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}arquetipos{/g}, como el de {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}oficial{/g}. Las habilidades que dan turnos extra no pueden usarse durante un turno extra.
languages.original_text: A mechanic that allows a character to act more than once during a single {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Usually extra turns are granted by the special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} of certain archetypes, such as the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}. Abilities that grant extra turns cannot be used during an extra turn.

traits.locale_text: Una mecánica que permite que un personaje actúe más de una vez en un mismo {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. Por lo general los turnos extra son concedidos por capacidades especiales de algunas {g|Encyclopedia:Career}doctrinas{/g}, como la de {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}líder{/g}. Las habilidades que dan turnos extra no pueden usarse durante un turno extra.

languages.original_text: Allows a character to go more than once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Extra moves are usually granted by special abilities of certain {g|Encyclopedia:Career}doctrines{/g}, such as {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}leader{/g}. You cannot use abilities that grant extra moves during an extra turn.

languages.text: キャラクターが1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}中に1度以上行動できる仕組み。通常、追加ターンは、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}士官{/g}のような特定の教義の特別な{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}によって授けられる追加ターンを与えるアビリティは、追加ターン中には使用できない。
languages.original_text: A mechanic that allows a character to act more than once during a single {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Usually extra turns are granted by the special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} of certain archetypes, such as the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}. Abilities that grant extra turns cannot be used during an extra turn.

traits.locale_text: キャラクターが1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}中に1度以上行動できる仕組み。通常、追加ターンは{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}リーダー{/g}のような特定の{g|Encyclopedia:Career}ドクトリン{/g}の特別なアビリティによって授けられる。追加ターンを与えるアビリティは、追加ターン中には使用できない。

languages.text: Bir karakterin tek bir {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntta{/g} birden fazla eylem gerçekleştirmesine olanak tanıyan bir mekanik. Ek turlar genellikle, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Subay{/g} gibi belirli bazı arketiplerin özel {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetleri{/g} tarafından sağlanır. Ek tur sağlayan kabiliyetler, ek turlar esnasında kullanılamazlar.
languages.original_text: A mechanic that allows a character to act more than once during a single {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Usually extra turns are granted by the special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} of certain archetypes, such as the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}. Abilities that grant extra turns cannot be used during an extra turn.
